# hhsitemapper

[![Project Status: WIP â€“ Initial development is in progress, but there has not yet been a stable, usable release suitable for the public.](http://www.repostatus.org/badges/latest/wip.svg)](http://www.repostatus.org/#wip) 

This R package contains a `drake` workflow which creates the dataset underlying the 
  Home and Hope [Site Mapper webtool](https://www.enterprisecommunity.org/where-we-work/pacific-northwest/home-and-hope-mapping-tool).
  

## Disclaimer

This project is a work-in-progress.
